definition: to watch from a height or distance/to survey
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: However, Toni, who knows Ribery well, believes the Bianconeri should sign him.
sentences.chinese: 然而託尼很瞭解裏貝里，並且相信尤文會簽下他。

sentences.english: I know him quite well, and there are wheels within wheels.
sentences.chinese: 我很瞭解他，那裏的人事關係很複雜。

sentences.english: You want to know more about Ili?
sentences.chinese: 你想更多地瞭解伊犁啊？

sentences.english: Learn how Montessori teaches mathematics in this free video clip.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解如何在這個自由蒙臺梭利教數學的視頻剪輯。

sentences.english: Acute toxicity test, mutation test and single-cell gel electrophoresis(SCGE)were used.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解三氯乙醛的毒性和致突變作用。

sentences.english: Some evidence is available to aid our understanding of the biogenesis of membrane of microbodies in plants.
sentences.chinese: 有些證據有助於我們瞭解植物微體膜的生物發生。

sentences.english: You should learn some ABCs of computer.
sentences.chinese: 你瞭解編程的基礎知識嗎？

sentences.english: Listen to the tape and find out the main idea of this article and how it is organized.
sentences.chinese: 通過聽錄音磁帶，來幫助學生對文章的結構有所瞭解。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo find out the cause and actualities of pre-hospital care of pedo-burn.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解小兒燒傷的致傷因素和院前急救現狀。

sentences.english: You can find more information from the Service Directory in your room .
sentences.chinese: 您可以從您房間的服務指南中瞭解更多的資料。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the in-doors air condition and the factors affecting the air quality of Guangzhou metro.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解影響廣州地鐵室內空氣質量的主要因素。

sentences.english: See publication AV-4, Actuated Thermoplastic Valves, for detailed information.
sentences.chinese: 參閱“執行機構驅動熱塑性閥門”，瞭解詳細資料。

sentences.english: Its authors had detailed knowledge of Siemens’ software and its security weaknesses.
sentences.chinese: 筆者已經詳細的瞭解了西門子軟件的安全漏洞在哪裏。

sentences.english: Objective To understand the needs of the families of hearing-impaired children.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解聽障兒童家長對康復認知與需求情況。

sentences.english: To learn more about Carrefour's mission and Sales Manager responsibilities.
sentences.chinese: 更多地瞭解我公司的使命和課長的職責。

sentences.english: Well, what do we know about extremes of chemical reactivity?
sentences.chinese: 好吧，我們對化學反應的極限有那些瞭解呢？

definition: to know from experience/to learn through experience/to realize/understanding/experience
to know/to recognize/to be familiar with/to get acquainted with sb/knowledge/understanding/awareness/cognition
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
not knowing anything at all (idiom); completely ignorant/without an inkling
to join/to connect/to link up/to communicate
to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
to be concerned about/to care about
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
